title: FS. T206 with stamps on the back some HOFers.
author: Joem36

posts.post_title: FS. T206 with stamps on the back some HOFers.
posts.post_content:
[URL=http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=250757&d=]Attachment 250757[/URL]Hi, it's time to sell some of my t206 with stamps on the back to raise some money for other things. The monster is winning, but I'm not done yet, just going in a different direction against the ugly beast. Here is the list of what I have:

I removed the cards that sold from the list.

Paskert with Dec 22 1912 stamp $25
Lavender with Lloyd Bolton stamp $25
Milan with May 31 stamp $30
Nichols with May 8 1910 stamp $25
Randall with R.B.S stamp $25
F. Smith with a stamp $25

Take the whole 6 card lot for $130

Will discount multiple purchases. 

Shipping is free and would like a PayPal gift to [url]lisajoe97@yahoo.com[/url] for payment.

Sorry for the small pics. Send me your email and I will get your better ones. Thanks
Joe
New cards added and sold one removed.
PM sent on griffith, collins, doolan
